author: cbs8
title: CSI globalVCard Presenting Electronic Payments Expertise at the 2015 Accounts Payable and Procure-to-Pay Fall Conference and Expo
text:
The industry’s only accounts payable event focused on AP education and practical solutions will be held at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas, October 25-28, 2015.
Bonita Springs, FL (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
CSI globalVCard, a leading provider of electronic payment solutions, will be sharing its expertise in accounts payable automation with attendees of the 2015 Accounts Payable and Procure-to-Pay Fall Conference & Expo (AP & P2P). Hosted by the Institute of Financial Management (IOFM), AP & P2P is recognized as the must-attend event for accounts payable professionals, bringing together AP experts and practitioners to provide relevant information on critical topics such as compliance, operational improvements and automation strategies.
Among the educational sessions will be a presentation delivered by David Disque , Managing Director at CSI globalVCard. Disque’s presentation, “Corporate Payments: What’s New, What’s Next,” will focus on AP innovation as well as emerging trends that will most impact the landscape in the coming years. Session details are provided below.
 Date: Monday, Oct 26, 2015 Session Title: Corporate Payments: What’s New, What’s Next Presenter: David Disque, CSI globalVCard Time: 2:45pm – 3:45pm, Track 5
CSI globalVCard staff will be available in Booth #102 to demonstrate the company’s electronic accounts payable and mobile payment solutions. Visitors will learn how easy it is to automate their accounts payable with CSI’s globalVCard paysystems, where they can securely process 100% of their payables, whether via virtual credit card, ACH or check payments. Learn more by visiting the company’s website .
About CSI globalVCard
Founded in 1989, CSI Enterprises has provided innovative payment solutions to world leading brands, while providing the highest level of customer service. The company’s highly secure financial payment products include the globalVCard® virtual payment solutions and award-winning mobile applications, corporate purchasing cards, and business fleet fueling/maintenance payment cards. Businesses rely on CSI’s products to control spending, reduce costs and increase profits in all areas of B2B payments, including accounts payable, business travel spending and fuel purchases. http://www.csiglobalvcard.com .
